4769.verse: فَلْيَأْتُواْ|Then let them bring|150|163|16221$بِحَدِيثٍ|a statement|101|126|16222$مِّثْلِهِۦٓ|like it,|72|97|221$إِن|if|44|69|225$كَانُواْ|they|69|94|94$صَـٰدِقِينَ|(are) truthful.|112|125|226$

4771.verse: أَمْ|Or|38|61|62$خَلَقُواْ|(did) they create|134|180|9400$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|161|351$وَٱلْأَرْضَ‌ۚ|and the earth?|118|164|2280$بَل|Nay,|50|96|848$لَّا|not|42|65|30$يُوقِنُونَ|they are certain.|132|132|50$

4772.verse: أَمْ|Or|38|60|62$عِندَهُمْ|with them|86|129|6910$خَزَآئِنُ|(are the) treasures|147|190|5610$رَبِّكَ|(of) your Lord|112|155|1322$أَمْ|or|38|81|62$هُمُ|(are) they|88|110|56$ٱلْمُصَۣيْطِرُونَ|the controllers?|148|148|16226$

4773.verse: أَمْ|Or|38|55|62$لَهُمْ|for them|76|111|98$سُلَّمٌ|(is) a stairway,|121|156|16227$يَسْتَمِعُونَ|they listen|110|145|8161$فِيهِ‌ۖ|therewith?|90|125|32$فَلْيَأْتِ|Then let bring,|117|134|16228$مُسْتَمِعُهُم|their listener,|108|208|16229$بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ|an authority|101|301|9542$مُّبِينٍ|clear.|66|166|3469$

4777.verse: أَمْ|Or|38|57|62$يُرِيدُونَ|(do) they intend|129|168|4112$كَيْدًا‌ۖ|a plot?|65|104|8808$فَٱلَّذِينَ|But those who|116|155|3632$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieve,|89|128|59$هُمُ|themselves|94|113|56$ٱلْمَكِيدُونَ|(are in) the plot.|131|131|16232$

4780.verse: فَذَرْهُمْ|So leave them|115|123|5958$حَتَّىٰ|until|64|80|526$يُلَـٰقُواْ|they meet|88|104|15569$يَوْمَهُمُ|their Day|80|96|15570$ٱلَّذِى|which|65|82|138$فِيهِ|in it|49|66|32$يُصْعَقُونَ|they will faint.|115|123|16236$

4781.verse: يَوْمَ|(The) Day|87|95|1057$لَا|not|42|58|30$يُغْنِى|will avail|75|91|8150$عَنْهُمْ|to them|72|88|2643$كَيْدُهُمْ|their plotting|105|121|3225$شَيْــًٔا|(in) anything,|110|126|472$وَلَا|and not|71|87|25$هُمْ|they|50|58|49$يُنصَرُونَ|will be helped.|114|114|477$

4783.verse: وَٱصْبِرْ|So be patient,|115|126|8353$لِحُكْمِ|for (the) Command|145|168|16237$رَبِّكَ|(of) your Lord,|117|140|1322$فَإِنَّكَ|for indeed, you|120|142|5398$بِأَعْيُنِنَا‌ۖ|(are) in Our Eyes.|138|149|8471$وَسَبِّحْ|And glorify|90|118|2842$بِحَمْدِ|(the) praise|98|155|9865$رَبِّكَ|(of) your Lord|112|169|1322$حِينَ|when|62|119|5281$تَقُومُ|you arise,|85|114|13082$

4767.verse: Or do their minds command them to [say] this, or are they a transgressing people?

4768.verse: Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe.

4769.verse: Then let them produce a statement like it, if they should be truthful.

4770.verse: Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators [of themselves]?

4771.verse: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather, they are not certain.

4772.verse: Or have they the depositories [containing the provision] of your Lord? Or are they the controllers [of them]?

4773.verse: Or have they a stairway [into the heaven] upon which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear authority.

4774.verse: Or has He daughters while you have sons?

4775.verse: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?

4776.verse: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?

4777.verse: Or do they intend a plan? But those who disbelieve - they are the object of a plan.

4778.verse: Or have they a deity other than Allah? Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.

4779.verse: And if they were to see a fragment from the sky falling, they would say, "[It is merely] clouds heaped up."

4780.verse: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible -

4781.verse: The Day their plan will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped.

4782.verse: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a punishment before that, but most of them do not know.

4783.verse: And be patient, [O Muhammad], for the decision of your Lord, for indeed, you are in Our eyes. And exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord when you arise.

4784.verse: And in a part of the night exalt Him and after [the setting of] the stars.
